description: This boot is suitable for year-round high altitude tours. The ideal companion for alpine challenges where low weight and high performance are essential. The Vibram Litebase outsole excels in both of these requirements. Comfort is not neglected either: the Taiss Pro High GTX guarantees warm and dry feet thanks to GORE-TEX footwear, plus the BOA® Fit System ensures the perfect fit, and fast, precise adjustments, even while wearing gloves. These semi-automatic crampon compatible boots are ready for anything.
name: Taiss Pro High GTX - Mens

specs.value: vibram® Ascension Litebase - Light PU wedge
schoeller® Soft Shell - Ripstop Textile & Mesh Protection
The dual-zone Boa® Fit System configuration delivers maximum adjustability and a performance fit that is intuitive, fast and precise
Abrasion-proof, three-dimensionally shaped element supports heel and protects against twisting of ankle
